title: Blood Feathers
description: Book 4 in Forbidden Secrets series. The books should be read in order for maximum pleasure. Marcie has hosted sex parties for years, but has yet to find the right partner. Love has never been an option for her, but she has a soft spot for romance. Everything changes when she finds herself hopelessly entangled with Mano, a man layered in secrets, who is not what he seems. He is even more dangerous than he is beautiful. She is hopelessly lost in love. They canâ€™t keep their hands off each other and the sex is intense and overwhelming. Mano takes her ever higher, satisfying her deepest desires as he helps her confront her fantastical new reality. In the whirlwind that follows, the Mistress finds herself transformed and must come to grips with the discovery of who and what she really is.
author: Diana Rose Wilson
